pages.text: The $(d)Summoning Pendulum$() can be used to $(3)store mobs to place them later$().$(br2)Simply right-click a mob with the Pendulum to store it inside. Then, right-click anywhere to summon it back out.
pages.title: Summoning Pendulum

pages.text: The Summoning Pendulum can store up to 5 mobs at a time.$(br2)Any mobs with the entity type tag $(c)#irregular_implements:summoning_pendulum_blacklist$() cannot be stored in the Pendulum.
